title: Food handler certificates and food safety manager cards
dataVerified: Certificate holder name, DOB, certification number, issuing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Certification status (active/expired). Link to certifying body system (employers and enforcement, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake food handler certificates. Domain binding verifies certifying body (ServSafe, NRFSP). Employment eligibility (required for food service). Prevents public health violations. Employer verification.
